product_overview: PetHub is an integrated pet care platform that empowers pet owners, veterinarians, and pet service providers with tools for pet management, healthcare tracking, social services, and user engagement through gamification.
core_goals: Enable users to easily add, view, and manage details of their pets across multiple devices with offline support.
Provide comprehensive tracking of pets' healthcare records including vaccines and veterinary appointments.
Enhance user engagement by implementing a gamification system with points, levels, and rewards.
Support pet-related services such as adoption, grooming, and veterinary care in a unified interface.
Ensure a smooth, responsive, and aesthetically modern user experience across all supported devices.
key_features: User authentication and secure user management via Supabase.
Robust pet management system allowing the addition, viewing, and editing of pet information with offline storage and cloud synchronization.
Healthcare records including vaccine log and appointment tracking that reward user participation with gamification points.
Comprehensive gamification engine that tracks user actions, awards points, enables leveling up, and displays badges and leaderboards.
Social and pet-related services modules supporting adoption, grooming, and veterinary clinic connections.
Responsive UI design leveraging Tailwind CSS with modern visuals including glassmorphism and gradients.
Offline-first capability using LocalStorage to maintain pet data availability even without network connection.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in using Supabase authentication and lands on the Home screen.
User navigates to 'My Pets' to add a new pet by selecting pet type and filling in details such as name, breed, and birth date.
Once added, the pet appears on the 'My Pets' list and Home screen with data saved locally and synced with Supabase.
User accesses a pet's detail page to expand vaccine records, add new vaccines, and save them, earning gamification points in the process.
User can view vaccination history globally on the 'Vaccines' page and track appointments on the 'Appointments' page.
Users interact with gamification features including earning points, leveling up, receiving notifications, and viewing leaderboards and badges.
The app provides access to social and service features such as pet adoption, grooming, and veterinary services.
All flows support offline usage and retain data via LocalStorage with periodic synchronization when online.
validation_criteria: User authentication works securely with Supabase allowing registration, login, and logout.
Pets added by users appear immediately in the UI and persist in LocalStorage and Supabase database reliably.
Vaccine records are successfully added, visible on pet and global vaccine pages, and gamification points are awarded accurately.
Gamification system correctly tracks points, updates user levels, and triggers appropriate feedback notifications and modals.
UI components render consistently across different device sizes, maintaining the defined visual design and responsiveness.
Offline storage retains data across app restarts and sync operations recover gracefully from network failures.
Pet-related service modules function correctly with accurate lists and interactions for adoption, grooming, and veterinary services.
Navigation between screens is smooth and intuitive, with no data loss or error states during typical user flows.
